(Yeah, I think slayer has a cloaking device on him or was given one 
by Prebon)

::Spears::
She looked around, waiting anxiuosly to see the Maximals arrivial.  
She was getting ready to put on a spark wrentching performace.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Scratch my last post with Slayer. I forgot that he was supposed to 
be 
> on the cliff.
> 
> ::Ramulus/Slayer::
> 
> Ramulus frons at Lunarpine, considering the bot's suggestion. 
> Finally, he nods. "Allright, but be careful. If they open fire, 
we'll 
> be the first targets."
> 
> He tosses Lunarpine a cloaking device. "But keep this on you. If 
they 
> do open fire, we can cloak and be harder targets. Let's go!"
> 
> He walks out of the room, Firearm, Proto, and Smokescreen following 
> him.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> (Is Slayer supposed to be cloaked?)
> 
> Slayer nods as he recieves Prebon's transmission, standing up on 
his 
> cliff. "Ready," he replies, optics and scanners scanning the 
horizon 
> for Maximals.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> > Brix/Fliq
> > 
> > Brix and Fliq both grabbed a cloaking device and attached it to 
> > themselves.
> > 
> > "Alright! There is no way we are leaving this battle without 
> Striker 
> > and Spears!"
